meanings.definition: Retired but retaining an honorary title corresponding to that held immediately before retirement.
meanings.sent1: The emeriti professor gave a lecture at the university.
meanings.sent2: The emeriti faculty member still attends academic events.
meanings.sent3: The emeriti scientist joked about being a 'retired genius'.
meanings.sent4: The emeriti status was a badge of honor among the retired professionals.
meanings.sent5: The emeriti title symbolized a lifetime of dedication to their field.

meanings.definition: A person who has retired but retains an honorary title corresponding to that held immediately before retirement.
meanings.sent1: The emeriti are respected members of the community.
meanings.sent2: The university honored the emeriti with a special ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The emeriti joked about forming a 'retired club'.
meanings.sent4: The emeriti were like living legends among the younger generation.
meanings.sent5: The emeriti's wisdom and experience were invaluable to the organization.
